translations: adj.定向性测定的；趋实体性的

sentences.sentence: Distances refer to the stereotactic space defined by Talairach and Tournoux.
sentences.translation: 距离是指塔莱拉赫和图尔诺定义的立体空间。

sentences.sentence: Methods: To analyze 60 cases of Stereotactic surgery and compare the effect with traditional method.
sentences.translation: 方法：回顾性分析60例立体定向手术，与传统手术方法的疗效进行比较和分析。

sentences.sentence: Therapy of 206 patients with pancreatic carcinoma (PC) with Stereotactic Gamma Ray Whole Body Therapeutic System.
sentences.translation: 采用立体定向伽玛射线全身治疗系统治疗206例胰腺癌(PC)患者。
